name: Megahorn
description: You charge at a creature for a devastating horn attack. Make a melee attack roll, doing 2d10 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. If you moved 20 feet or more straight towards a target, immediately before activating this move, force a creature to make a STR save against your Move DC or be knocked prone.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
